name: Badge Of Shame
description:
If a badge is a symbol of honor for the police department then this is a Badge of Shame for those that tarnish that reputation. Daniel Pantaleo used an illegal choke hold on Eric Garner that cause the loss of his life. Eric was selling loose cigarettes when he was confronted by Pantaleo. Instead of de-escalating the situation the officers used excessive force.
The animation is created from a set of 12 paper mache Shields that were put up around the streets of New York City in 2018. There are 6 left. The bright colors are meant as a warning. If you see an officer wearing a shame shield stay away.
